metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21647 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Puma is a web server for Ruby/Rack applications built for parallelism.Prior to version 6.4.2, puma exhibited incorrect behavior when parsingchunked transfer encoding bodies in a way that allowed HTTP requestsmuggling. Fixed versions limits the size of chunk extensions. Without thislimit, an attacker could cause unbounded resource (CPU, network bandwidth)consumption. This vulnerability has been fixed in versions 6.4.2 and 5.6.8.

criterions.comment: puma package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
